font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 凹的：curved like the inner surface of a sphere
【例】a concave lens 凹透镜
【近】dented, depressed, dished, indented, recessed
【反】bulging, convex, protuberant 凸的

【记】 con + cave 洞→一起使成为凹洞
